topics.body: So apparently there is a "Monster high Anime":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bh_4YN1H7Sg [Or at least some shorts done in japanese] and the animation is just awful. The still frames look decent for the most part but in motion it almost looks like a pheonix games movie. Seriosuly its a three minute short based on a fairly successful franchise and they couldn't afford better animation then that?
